description:
The HiTech 2018 Program will have its final session on July 3 at Porto Business School starting at 2:00 p.m.
In this session, the 12 projects that participated in HiTech will pitch their tech-based business ideas to the audience. These projects are based on innovative technologies developed at several Portuguese R&D institutions and have been screened for four months by teams composed of researchers, management students, and business mentors.
In its first edition, but capitalizing on a legacy of fourteen years’ experience, HiTech is a cohort-based training Program that provides skills to participants in technology commercialization and entrepreneurship. HiTech translates cutting-edge technology and scientific discoveries into high-growth business opportunities. 
The program run in two different location (Porto Business School & Nova School of Business & Economics) and with the support of faculty from the Universities of Brown, North Carolina State, and Rutgers. 
HiTech closing session program soon available.



HiTech 2018 projects:
2Resource School of Science and Technology - Universidade Nova de Lisboa
3D Printing of Medicines School of Pharmacy - Universidade de LisboaAntiBioCoat i3S/IBMC
Aqua in Silico School of Science and Technology - Universidade Nova de LisboaGlycoDiagnostic IPATIMUP/i3S
MediVOC School of Medicine - Universidade do Porto
OncoAdvanC+ International Iberian Nanotechnology Laboratory (INL), IPATIMUP/I3S and Universidade do Minho
Plastics-4B Institute for Biotechnology and Bioengineering -Instituto Superior Técnico
PPK Institute of Biomedicine- Universidade de Aveiro
R-CIS CENIMAT-i3N
Targ.Tex Institute of Molecular Medicine - Universidade de Lisboa
UNI.Value CIIMAR
name: HiTech 2018 Closing Session
